description:
- Avoid meeting a 'living corpse'.
- Hide from him in closets.
- Find key items to progress through the game.
- Find the key to the front door and run away from this house.
name: Dissection
intro: I donâ€™t remember how I got into this house. I only know that I need to quickly find a way out. Something terrible is walking around the house and looking for me.
